entry.source: {F812}Demonoid woman\0{F87A,104}{F813,1,419303}King Akira's going around all the{F801}cities and counting the neurishers.{F801}He'll send more to any that need them.{F801}{F802}It's a real step towards equality!{F801}I'm so happy to hear about this.{F801}{F802}Seeing that girl next door being{F801}fawned over all the time was really{F801}annoying.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demonoid woman\0{F87A,104}{F813,1,419303}King Akira's going around all the{F801}cities and counting the neurishers.{F801}He'll send more to any that need them.{F801}{F802}It's a real step towards equality!{F801}I'm so happy to hear about this.{F801}{F802}Seeing that girl next door being{F801}fawned over all the time was really{F801}annoying.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Neurisher\0{F87A,110}{F813,1,403531}When I was normal, I couldn't get a{F801}man to give me so much as the time of{F801}day. But now that I'm a neurisher...{F801}{F802}The demonoid men are all so nice to{F801}me! None of them ever call me ugly!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Neurisher\0{F87A,110}{F813,1,403531}When I was normal, I couldn't get a{F801}man to give me so much as the time of{F801}day. But now that I'm a neurisher...{F801}{F802}The demonoid men are all so nice to{F801}me! None of them ever call me ugly!{F801}
